00022 /**
00023  * @file   SnpModelConverter.h
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Mon Mar 15 10:31:04 2010
00026  * 
00027  * @brief  Class collecting utility methods for reading various formats of snp models like:
00028  * - Brlmm-p (aka labelz) used for snp5, snp6 and Axiom
00029  * - Birdseed priors used for snp 6
00030  * - Birdseed posteriors from snp 6
00031  * 
00032  * Additional details about file formats etc. are available on the internal wiki:
00033  * http://infowiki.ev.affymetrix.com/index.php/GenotypingModelFiles
00034  * 
00035  */
00036 
00037

00046 #include <string>
00047 
00048 /**
00049  * Going forward we want to put:
00050  * 'official-affy-model' in files
00051  * 'chip-analysis-type' in file
00052  * 'total-model-count' in file
00053  * 'model-type' in file.
00054  */
00055

00067 /**
00068  * @brief  Class collecting utility methods for reading various formats of snp models like:
00069  * - Brlmm-p (aka labelz) used for snp5, snp6 and Axiom
00070  * - Birdseed priors used for snp 6
00071  * - Birdseed posteriors from snp 6
00072  * 
00073  * Additional details about file formats etc. are available on the internal wiki:
00074  * http://infowiki.ev.affymetrix.com/index.php/GenotypingModelFiles
00075  * 
00076  */

00083   std::string("none"),

00087 class SnpModelConverter {

00100         SNP6,

00102         LAST_CHP_TYPE,
00103     };
00104 
00105     enum SnpModelFileType {
00106         UNKNOWN_FILE,
00107         BIRDSEED_PRIOR,
00108         BIRDSEED_POSTERIOR,
00109         BRLMMP_MODEL,
00110         BRLMMP_MODEL_HDF5,
00111         SQLITE_MODEL_FILE,
00112         LAST_MODEL_TYPE
00113     };
00114 
00115     SnpModelConverter(enum SnpChipType chip=UNKNOWN_CHIP, enum SnpModelFileType model=UNKNOWN_FILE) : 
00116         m_ChipType(chip), m_FileType(model) {}
